title: Dwarf Voice Pack
description: 277 Dwarf vocal sound effects interpreted by a professional voice actor.
longDescription:
Dwarf Voice Pack

277 Dwarf vocal sound effects interpreted by a professional voice actor (we provide 2 variations of the 279 SFX, so you have a total of 837 SFX).


🔊 YouTube Preview - Listen to the tracks

📜 Tracklist PDF

(optional) 🔊 Listen to the track individually on Soundcloud


3 types of voice: 

1- Normal/standard voice

2- Lower tone voice

3- Even lower tone voice

This way you can choose the voice that fits better your Dwarf character.


The vocal sounds are divided in:

- Dialogues: Different and varied dialogue lines.

- Attacking (different intensities)

- Emotions (laughs, angry, etc..)

- Suffering attacks (different intensities)

- Efforts

- Breathings


This pack can be complemented with:

Old Wizard Voice Pack

Orc Voice Pack

Pirate Voice Pack

Goblin Voice Pack

Cute Cartoon Voice

Zombie Voice Pack


More about the pack:

- This SFX are also suitable for other races like humans.

- Intuitive file naming.

- All you'll ever need regarding dwarf vocal sounds.


[Professional audio services]

For custom music, sound design, sound engineering or any other game audio services, please send a mail to: audioalchemiststore@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 831

Number of Audio Cues: 831

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some yes, some no, depends of the use.

Minutes of audio provided: 21 minutes
